title: codereview: change R= to LGTM= (with lgtmers only)
body:
code review currently uses the email address local part when listing reviewers, CC and
TBR in commit descriptions:
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/browse/lib/codereview/codereview.py#1898

This has very confusing output in some cases.
In my case I have an email address in the format google@mydomain.tpl which results as
"google" being listed as a reviewer:
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=45c12efb4635

I think it might be better to use the nickname, which is unique and much more likely to
be a correct identifier.
